name: Re:Aring
description:
A game about learning how to be.

Created by Chase Foti-Landis and Richard Santos Raya.

Code by Chase Foti-Landis

Design by Richard Santos Raya

Sprites By Richard Santos Raya

Music by Gabija Vaicekonis and Robert Raya

Backgrounds by Zaicuch - @zaicuch

Made in GameMaker Studio 2

This is currently still being built.  If you find any bugs/crashes, please let us know in as much detail as possible!  We currently have no plans on charging for the game and this project was started as a means of learning how games are made.

The sprites used for the brothers are not our own and were made using references from spriters-resource.com.  Link to the sprites here .  

KNOWN BUGS:

Platforms can be "entered" into horizontally.

Flying bad guys can be taken off course by blocking them in certain ways.
